response.overview: After gaining independence in Kazakhstan, interest in Islam has sharply increased. The vast majority of Kazakhs call themselves Muslims. At the same time, many young people in recent years have become adherents of non-traditional movements. Radical Islam is gaining momentum in the world, and Russia is no exception. What can be opposed to this, how to deal with it? Muslims themselves, theologians, political scientists, historians argue about this. The key episode of the tape is the terrorist attack in Aktobe. The film is based on the chronicle, memories of relatives and friends of those who went to non-traditional Islam.
response.title: Path to Fathe
